snippet: Andy Murray moved into the Australian Open fourth round in surreal circumstances on Saturday, completing a 6-2 3-6 6-2 6-2 victory over Joao Sousa after his father-in-law had collapsed ill a few hundred meters away....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray moved into the Australian Open fourth round in surreal circumstances on Saturday, completing a 6-2 3-6 6-2 6-2 victory over Joao Sousa after his father-in-law had collapsed ill a few hundred meters away.

headline.print_headline: Murray Win Overshadowed by Father-In-Law's Collapse
headline.main: Murray Win Overshadowed by Father-In-Law's Collapse
